articles.title: Scholz in China on awkward trip for Germany and EU - BBC
articles.description: Germany's leader has met Xi Jinping on a visit sparking controversy at home and concern in Europe.
articles.content:
German Chancellor Olaf Scholz has met Chinese President Xi Jinping, the first G7 leader to visit Beijing since the Covid-19 pandemic.
But his trip has sparked controversy in Germany and concern else… [+5611 chars]
